metadata.dc:description: Infectious mononucleosis by Epstein-Barr virus is usually a benign self-limiting disease. We present two cases admitted in the same week, with suspected co-infection by other viruses (cytomegalovirus and human herpes virus 6), which showed severe thrombocytopenia in the acute phase of the disease. The progress and treatment were different in each case.
metadata.dc:title: Mononucleosis infecciosa y trombopenia grave.
[Infectious mononucleosis and severe thrombocytopenia].
